scripts.build: npm run build:shaders && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js -s dgl | uglifyjs -m -c --screw-ie8 > dist/2gl.js
scripts.dev: npm run dev:dist & npm run dev:shaders
scripts.dev:dist: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/index.js -s dgl -o dist/2gl.js -dv
scripts.test: npm run build:shaders && ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node.js ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- test/*.spec.js test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:shaders && ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --compilers js:babel-register -w test/*.spec.js test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run build:es5 && npm publish && git clean -d -f
